meanings.definition: A person who installs and maintains piping systems for steam.
meanings.sent1: The steamfitters worked hard to fix the broken pipe.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is a skilled steamfitter who knows all about steam systems.
meanings.sent3: Why did the steamfitters bring a ladder to fix the steam pipe? To reach new heights!
meanings.sent4: The steamfitters are the unsung heroes who keep our buildings running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The clang of metal echoed through the building as the steamfitters worked their magic.

meanings.definition: The trade or profession of installing and maintaining piping systems for steam.
meanings.sent1: Learning to become a steamfitter requires dedication and hard work.
meanings.sent2: The steamfitters' union ensures fair wages and benefits for its members.
meanings.sent3: The steamfitters' convention was a piping hot event!
meanings.sent4: In the world of construction, steamfitters play a crucial role in keeping things running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The steamfitters' expertise in handling steam systems is unmatched in the industry.
